jd: From: Jenifer.A, Kovan Technology Solutions jenifer.a@kovantech.com Reply to: jenifer.a@kovantech.com Hi Professional, Hope you are safe and good, Please find the below JD and share the suitable profiles Role Job Title : Senior Project Manager - Need 15+ YearsLocation: Houston, TX or Chicago, IL (Hybrid) - Local candidates OnlyDuration: ContractCertifications: PM and scrum agile certifications are required Job description:Management of the migration ensuring it’s delivered based on the business outcomes. This also includes leading the teams (i.e. squads and pods, etc.) to deliver this migrationPlanning (i.e. PI, sprint, etc.), accessing and monitoring should also include the application of agile values, principles and mindsets where applicableProactively manage constraints, stakeholders, interdependencies, risks and conflicting priorities to deliver the migration program Provide advice and guidance to the product pods taking an integrated view of products that cross team and domain boundaries to simplify delivery, improve efficiency and promote reuse of existing solutionsManage trade-offs in support of creating balance between project/product scope, budget (i.e. keeping into consideration due to scope or timeline changes) and time for the program migrationAgree and align the program scope with Product Manager, customers, senior management and stakeholders priorities. Ensure aligned scope is maintained, avoiding scope creep, adapting scope where suitable and beneficial throughout the Fleet program migrationProvide transparent communication (i.e. via ADO daily stand-ups, WPR forms, etc.) between product pods, various squads and stakeholders up to the executive level throughout the product lifecycle specifically for Fleet program migration Thanks & Regards, Jenifer🕵️‍♀️ Senior Recruiter Kovan Technology Solutions Certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) ✉ Email : Jenifer.A@kovantech.com |🌐 www.kovantech.com🔗 Linkedin - Connect with me on LinkedIn for a quick response!
